name: Youtuber's slander
description:
You must eliminate two youtubers in your house and steal their KONIMU cards. It's my first ever game being uploaded , any tips or improve are good to take. [GAME made in 2 days / heavy because it's unreal engine it can be hard to launch, so don't except it to run on every computer]

Controls :

WASD : movement

P : pause

LEft click : attack

E : interact

shift + w : run
